snippet: Sporting Kansas City and Real Salt Lake, which will meet in the championship game of Major League Soccer on Saturday, have a history of hard feelings.
lead_paragraph: Sporting Kansas City and Real Salt Lake, which will meet in the championship game of Major League Soccer on Saturday, have a history of hard feelings.

headline.main: M.L.S. Final Is Only the Latest Collision Between Kansas City and Salt Lake
headline.print_headline: M.L.S. Final Is Only the Latest Collision Between Kansas City and Salt Lake
